**icon**: The icon link / file

**Type**: client / instance / guild

**Name**: <name>

**Short description**: A one-line summary of the client/instance.

**Link / Install**: (link to project, invite code, or installation instructions)

**Tags**: (comma-separated tags, e.g. web, android, ...)

**Long description**:
- Provide any important notes, compatibility details, or special installation steps, you can use markdown.

You can add screenshot of the client/guild/instance
